DOC.criteria: An overweight child ( > 95th % ) family age 812 . A parent willing participate attend treatment meeting . Family willing commit 6 month treatment attendance , followup 6 month posttreatment . Family willing submit $ 60 deposit . Child psychiatric disorder diagnosis ( base parent report ) . Child diagnose serious current physical disease ( diabetes ) physician supervision diet exercise prescription need . Family restriction type food , food allergy , religious ethnic practice limit food available home . Child physical difficulty limit ability exercise . Child active eating disorder .
